_sText:
Ok :D

I've upgraded the map to a 2. version.
Hope u like it.

A little more cool effects has been added since last version.

tip: Try to Destroy the fire by destroying the firewood. (the lost people will get angry)

And the HDR are a little better on this version.

more cubemaps makes the map look more realistic.

extract the bsp file here:

"programfiles/steam/steamapps/"accountname"/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps"

The 3DSB has been upgraded to.
try to find the volcano :D
